unnormalised: ## Bollywood's Bhaji & Behenjis: The Spiciest Samosa of Gossip This Week!
normalised: Bollywood's Bhaji and Behenjis: The Spiciest Samosa of Gossip This Week!

unnormalised: Namaste and welcome back to your weekly dose of garam masala gossip, straight from the heart of Bollywood! This week, the chai is extra strong and the rumours are simmering hotter than a plate of freshly made biryani.
normalised: Namaste and welcome back to your weekly dose of garam masala gossip, straight from the heart of Bollywood! This week, the chai is extra strong and the rumors are simmering hotter than a plate of freshly made biryani.

unnormalised: First up, whispers are swirling faster than a dhol beat at a Punjabi wedding about our beloved actress, Priya Kapoor. Sources (my auto driver, mostly) claim she was spotted "sharing a very intimate moment" (read: a pani puri) with director Rahul Verma at Bandra’s Linking Road last Tuesday. Verma, of course, is rumoured to be dating rising star, Neha Sharma. Drama, baby, DRAMA! Is this a love triangle or just a very complicated search for the perfect golgappa? We'll keep you posted!
normalised: First up, whispers are swirling faster than a dhol beat at a Punjabi wedding about our beloved actress, Priya Kapoor. Sources (my auto driver, mostly) claim she was spotted "sharing a very intimate moment" (read: a pani puri) with director Rahul Verma at Bandra's Linking Road last Tuesday. Verma, of course, is rumored to be dating rising star, Neha Sharma. Drama, baby, DRAMA! Is this a love triangle or just a very complicated search for the perfect golgappa? We'll keep you posted!

unnormalised: Then there's the saga of Ranbir “Rocky” Singh. Remember him? The national heartthrob who played a lovelorn engineering student from IIT-Delhi in *Dil Toh Bachcha Hai Ji*? Apparently, he’s been spending quality time with… wait for it… social media influencer, Chutki! Chutki, famous for her mango pickle reviews (yes, really), was seen exiting Rocky's Juhu bungalow at 3 AM this Wednesday. My sources tell me Rocky was blasting Honey Singh songs till that time. Is this the beginning of a beautiful, albeit bizarre, Bollywood romance fueled by mango pickle and bad Bollywood remixes? Only time will tell!
normalised: Then there's the saga of Ranbir “Rocky” Singh. Remember him? The national heartthrob who played a lovelorn engineering student from I I T-Delhi in *Dil Toh Bachcha Hai Ji*? Chutki, famous for her mango pickle reviews (yes, really), was seen exiting Rocky's Juhu bungalow at three A M this Wednesday. My sources tell me Rocky was blasting Honey Singh songs till that time. Is this the beginning of a beautiful, albeit bizarre, Bollywood romance fueled by mango pickle and bad Bollywood remixes? Only time will tell!

unnormalised: And finally, a little birdie (okay, it was my auntie) tells me that Kareena “Bebo” Khan is planning a massive Onam celebration at her farmhouse in Lonavala next month. Apparently, she's hired celebrity chef Sanjeev Kapoor himself to prepare a grand Onasadya. Invitations are *highly* coveted, so if you suddenly find yourself invited, congratulations, you’ve officially made it in Bollywood.

unnormalised: That’s all the gossip for now, folks! Keep your ears to the ground and your eyes on the stars! Until next week, stay spicy! And remember, take everything you read here with a pinch of salt (especially the mango pickle rumours). Peace out!
